description: This file contains Dart classes and a data source for managing catalog items and home payload data in a Flutter application. It loads JSON data from assets, provides search and recommendation functions, and defines data models for catalog items and home screen content.

classes.name: CatalogItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the local catalog with details like id, title, poster, overview, tags, genres, year, runtime, rating, and similar items.

classes.name: HomePayload
classes.description: Models the data structure for the home screen, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster, and a list of recommended catalog items.

classes.name: LocalDataSource
classes.description: Loads local JSON assets for home and catalog data, provides methods for accessing catalog items, searching, and generating recommendations.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads catalog and home data from assets and builds internal data structures.

methods.name: getHome
methods.description: Returns the HomePayload data for the home screen.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a catalog item by its ID, or null if not found.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search over titles, tags, and genres.

methods.name: getRecommendations
methods.description: Provides a list of recommended catalog items based on a seed item ID, using 'similar' list or genre overlap.
